input_text.Prompt:
You will write a professional product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product title information.

Product title:
Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly

Product keywords:
Homelite/John Deere Trimmer Head Assembly
Fits John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers
Pre-wound trimmer spool
.095" diameter
input_text.Response A: The Arnold .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is designed to fit John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers. It comes pre-wound with a trimmer spool.
input_text.Response B: Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is a pre-wound spool that fits Homelite and John Deere straight shaft string trimmers. It is ideal for trimming lawns, gardens, and other outdoor spaces. The spool has a diameter of .095 inches, making it suitable for medium-sized trimming jobs. It is a durable product that will last for many seasons.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
